official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the wage schedules for all prevailing rate employees be adjusted consistently in accordance with public policy.

summary.text: Establishes a uniform method for determining the pay of prevailing rate employees. (Current provisions exclude prevailing rate employees of the Department of Defense.)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the wage schedules for all prevailing rate employees be adjusted consistently in accordance with public policy.
